content.prompt: In the first sentence of the second paragraph, the author includes the parenthetical statement about the “sensible writer” primarily to

choices.label: acknowledge that she is not well acquainted with the writer’s works
complain about the lack of availability of the writer’s book during her travels
apologize in advance if she is not a reliable reporter of the source’s words
admit that she may be misrepresenting the writer’s original intentions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
